name: 3SD Hazy
author: olwall
notes:
About as easy as it gets to get to KoG. It wins almost everything and the best decision is also almost always pretty obvious. I played this while watching CS:GO and still only lost 4 or 5 to KoG from legend 1
Would probably add Cattle Drive when I get it and Flame Tiger could go to 3 if I had another. Relish in 3SD before it suddenly sucks
